thread.title: Meta (META) Partners with TKO (TKO); Nintendo (NTDOY) Unveils Switch 2
thread.title_full: Meta (META) Partners with TKO (TKO); Nintendo (NTDOY) Unveils Switch 2

author: @gurufocus
title: Meta (META) Partners with TKO (TKO); Nintendo (NTDOY) Unveils Switch 2
text:
Key Takeaways:
- Meta Platforms (
META, Financial) partners with TKO Group to become the official marketing partner for UFC events.
- Nintendo unveils the launch date and pricing for its upcoming Switch 2 console.
- Analyst forecasts reveal significant potential upside for Meta Platforms' stock.
Meta Platforms (META) has teamed up with TKO Group (TKO) to become the official marketing and technology partner for UFC events. Meanwhile, Nintendo (NTDOY) has made headlines by announcing that its highly anticipated Switch 2 console will hit the market on June 5, 2024. Priced at $450, this new console promises enhanced speed and size.
Wall Street Analysts Forecast
Investors should take note of the one-year price targets offered by 63 analysts for Meta Platforms Inc (
META, Financial). The average target price is projected at $750.29, with high estimates reaching $935.00 and low estimates at $260.00. This average target suggests a potential upside of 28.49% from the current trading price of $583.93. For a more detailed breakdown, visit the Meta Platforms Inc (META) Forecast page.
The consensus recommendation from 72 brokerage firms positions Meta Platforms Inc (
META, Financial) at an average brokerage recommendation of 1.8, signifying an "Outperform" status. On the rating scale, 1 corresponds to a Strong Buy, while 5 indicates a Sell. This rating underscores analysts' positive sentiment towards Meta's growth prospects.
According to GuruFocus estimates, Meta Platforms Inc's (
META, Financial) estimated GF Value for the next year is $495.17. This suggests a potential downside of 15.2% from the current price of $583.93. The GF Value represents GuruFocus' assessment of the fair value at which the stock should trade, derived from historical trading multiples, past business growth, and future performance projections. For a comprehensive view, refer to the Meta Platforms Inc (META) Summary page.
